title: 이달의소녀탐구 #470 (LOONA TV #470)
summary:
0:01 -- Go Won is feeling the 'Curse of HaSeul' that she left on Iceland.
0:11 -- Go Won just smiles without words.
0:17 -- Hyejoo mentions that she was supposed to take care of Go Won but instead she is drinking Hot Tea (that kinda looks like Udon Soup)
0:29 -- HyeWon hug 🤗. Go Won is glad that her part is done. (But little did she realize it wasn't).
0:47 -- She has to run for a long time in Iceland. Go Won: "I wonder why we keep running always. Is it part of the LOOΠΔVERSE." The PD replies "obviously"
